info.title: Testing Swagger Documentation...
info.description: This is a sample server Petstore server.  You can find out more about Swagger at [http://swagger.io](http://swagger.io) or on [irc.freenode.net, #swagger](http://swagger.io/irc/).  For this sample, you can use the api key `special-key` to test the authorization filters.

get.description: Muliple tags can be provided with comma separated strings. Use tag1, tag2, tag3 for testing.
Multiple status values can be provided with comma separated strings

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Status values that need to be considered for filter

post.summary: Updates a pet in the store with form data

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be updated

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

post.summary: Add a new pet to the store

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Pet object that needs to be added to the store

parameters.name: additionalMetadata
parameters.description: Additional data to pass to server

get.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities

post.summary: Place an order for a pet

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: order placed for purchasing the pet

get.description: For valid response try integer IDs with value >= 1 and <= 10. Other values will generated exceptions

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of pet that needs to be fetched

delete.description: For valid response try integer IDs with positive integer value. Negative or non-integer values will generate API errors

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order that needs to be deleted

post.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

post.summary: Creates list of users with given input array
Creates list of users with given input array

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The password for login in clear text

X-Rate-Limit.description: calls per hour allowed by the user

X-Expires-After.description: date in UTC when token expires

get.summary: Logs out current logged in user session

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be fetched. Use user1 for testing.

put.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: name that need to be updated

delete.description: This can only be done by the logged in user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The name that needs to be deleted

get.description: Returns all pets from the system that the user has access to

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: maximum number of results to return

post.description: Creates a new pet in the store.  Duplicates are allowed

parameters.name: pet
parameters.description: Pet to add to the store

get.description: Returns a user based on a single ID, if the user does not have access to the pet

delete.description: deletes a single pet based on the ID supplied

parameters.name: petId
parameters.description: The id of the pet to retrieve

200.description: Expected response to a valid request

firstname.description: The first name of the customer.

secondname.description: The second name of the customer.

thirdname.description: The third name of the customer.

fourthname.description: The unknown name of the customer.

todo.description: This API call has no documentated response (yet)

externalDocs.description: Find out more about our store
